mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal_info ( age, careAddr, careNm, careTel, officetel, colorCd, desertionNo, filename, popfile, happenDt, happenPlace, kindCd, neuterYn, noticeSdt, noticeEdt, noticeNo, orgNm, processState, sexCd, specialMark, weight ) VALUES ( #{age}, #{careAddr}, #{careNm}, #{careTel}, #{officetel}, #{colorCd}, #{desertionNo}, #{filename}, #{popfile}, #{happenDt}, #{happenPlace}, #{kindCd}, #{neuterYn}, #{noticeSdt}, #{noticeEdt}, #{noticeNo}, #{orgNm}, #{processState}, #{sexCd}, #{specialMark}, #{weight} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) as cnt from animal_info where processState ='보호중'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT count(*) as noCnt FROM animal_info WHERE noticeSdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH ) AND NOW()
select * from animal_info where noticeSdt >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
select * from animal_info where (sexCd = 'M' or sexCd = 'F') and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select count(sexCd) as sex from animal_info where sexCd='M'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
union select count(sexCd) as sex from animal_info where sexCd = 'F'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select count(neuterYn) as neuter from animal_info where neuterYn = 'Y'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
union select count(neuterYn) as neuter from animal_info where neuterYn = 'N'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select year(happenDt) as year, month(happenDt) as month, count(*) as dogCnt from animal_info
where date_format(happenDt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and happenDt > DATE_SUB(now(), interval 3 month)
group by year, month order by happenDt asc

select count(*) as dogState, processState as p_state from animal_info where processState = '종료(반환)' union select count(*) as dogState, processState as p_state from animal_info where processState = '종료(자연사)' union select count(*) as dogState, processState as p_state from animal_info where processState = '종료(안락사)' union select count(*) as dogState, processState as p_state from animal_info where processState = '종료(입양)' union select count(*) as dogState, processState as p_state from animal_info where processState = '종료(기증)' union select count(*) as dogState, processState as p_state from animal_info where processState = '종료(방사)'
and date_format(noticeEdt, "%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")

select count(*) as c_cnt from cat_info where processState ='보호중'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT count(*) as c_noCnt FROM cat_info WHERE noticeSdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH ) AND NOW()

select count(sexCd) as c_sex from cat_info where sexCd='M'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
union select count(sexCd) as c_sex from cat_info where sexCd = 'F'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select count(neuterYn) as c_neuter from cat_info where neuterYn = 'Y'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
union select count(neuterYn) as c_neuter from cat_info where neuterYn = 'N'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select year(happenDt) as year, month(happenDt) as month, count(*) as catCnt from cat_info
where date_format(happenDt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and happenDt > DATE_SUB(now(), interval 3 month)
group by year, month order by happenDt asc

select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료(반환)' union select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료(자연사)' union select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료(안락사)' union select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료(입양)' union select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료(기증)' union select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료(방사)' union select count(*) as catState, processState as p_state from cat_info where processState = '종료()'
and date_format(noticeEdt, "%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")

select count(*) as o_cnt from other_info where processState ='보호중'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT count(*) as o_noCnt FROM other_info WHERE noticeSdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH ) AND NOW()

select count(sexCd) as o_sex from other_info where sexCd='M'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
union select count(sexCd) as o_sex from other_info where sexCd = 'F'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select count(neuterYn) as o_neuter from other_info where neuterYn = 'Y'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
union select count(neuterYn) as o_neuter from other_info where neuterYn = 'N'
and date_format(noticeSdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select year(happenDt) as year, month(happenDt) as month, count(*) as otherCnt from other_info
where date_format(happenDt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and happenDt > DATE_SUB(now(), interval 3 month)
group by year, month
